Link a binance account

  1. Create a Binance Account: If you don’t have a Binance account, sign up here.
  2. Log In to Your Binance Account: Log in using your credentials.
  3. Access API Management: Click on the profile icon in the top-right corner, then select "Account" from the dropdown menu.
  4. Create an API Key: Click "Create API," choose "System generated," and give your new API key a descriptive name.
  5. Configure API Settings:
    • Select "Restrict access to trusted IPs only."
    • Add your server's IP address {{server_ip}}.
    • Click "Confirm."
  6. Set Permissions: Enable "Spot & Margin Trading" and "Futures." Click "Save" to confirm your settings.
  7. Integrate API with Your Website:
    • Copy the API Key and Secret Key.
    • Paste them into the appropriate form fields on your website.
  8. Select Trading Preferences: Choose between Spot, USDⓈ-M Futures, or Coin-M Futures, then click "Save." {% comment %} {% endcomment %}
  9. Finalize and Test: Ensure the integration works. If you encounter any issues, contact our support team. {% comment %} {% endcomment %}
